item.title: 10 Tips for the Beginner Hackathon Participant
item.description: As fall closes in, the hackathon season reaches its peak. Here’s a quick list of tips to maximize your opportunity as you plan to participate — and win your next hackathon. Agence Producteurs Locaux Damien Kühn / Unsplash *Team up early.* If you already have your team picked, great. If you don’t, don’t waste time. Start introducing yourself to others looking for teammates. Relationships you build at this event will be invaluable as you grow professionally.
